notifications.body:
A new major release v3.0 is now available with new cool things:

  • New and improved timeline mode
  • OHLC and candlestick chart types for financial data
  • Ability to add event markers to data series
  • Entirely new Web Components API for client-side developers
  • Lots of small improvements and fixes

Get it now!
notifications.title: Vaadin Charts 3.0 Final released

notifications.body:
Join the webinar on Domain Driven Design with Petter Holmström (Vaadin Architect) and Rolf Smeds (Vaadin Designer). Ask questions and learn live by signing up.

Webinar takes place on Thursday April 14, 2016 @ 2PM CEST
notifications.title: Webinar: Domain Driven Design

notifications.body:
Vaadin Framework, Vaadin Framework Best Practices, and Vaadin Framework Client-side trainings are coming to Rome, Italy in April 2016.

Check out the training calendar, read the course outline and sign up below.
notifications.title: Vaadin Trainings in Rome

notifications.body:
Vaadin Trainings is the best way to learn about Vaadin (https://vaadin.com/training) but what do you actually learn at a training? Join this webinar by trainers Sebastian Nyholm and Thomas Mattsson for a sneak peek into the trainings.

Webinar takes place on Thursday April 28, 2016 @ 2PM CEST
notifications.title: Webinar: Vaadin Trainings sneak peek

notifications.body:
Du bist auf der Suche nach einem Framework um unkompliziert eindrucksvolle Web Anwendungen zu entwickeln? Du hast von Vaadin gehört, bist dir aber nicht sicher wie du am besten anfängst? Lass dir bei unserem Webinar von Frederik und Jürgen zeigen wie Vaadin funktioniert und wie du damit in kurzer Zeit selbst tolle Anwendungen entwickeln kannst.

Webinar takes place on Wednesday April 13, 2016 @ 2PM CEST
notifications.title: Webinar: Eine praktische Einführung in Vaadin (in German)

notifications.body: What tools and frameworks are you using with Vaadin? Answer the survey by RebelLabs to let your voice be heard.
notifications.title: Java Tools & Technologies Survey

notifications.body:
Do you have an existing JSF of Struts application and would like to integrate a Vaadin-based view into your existing app? Join the webinar to get tips on how to do this in the best possible way. Add your questions and comments beforehand and we'll be sure to address all your concerns and use-cases in the webinar. The webinar is hosted by Vaadin Experts Matti Tahvonen and Alejandro Duarte.

Webinar takes place on Thursday May 12, 2016 @ 2PM CEST
notifications.title: Webinar: Integrating Vaadin views into Struts and JSF applications

notifications.body:
How do you like your Vaadin? What do you usually have as a side-dish with it? Where do you find your recipes for awesome apps?

Results will be public info in the blog so you can see how others have answered. And we'll learn more about the community at the same time.

Help Vaadin by answering this one page survey.
notifications.title: Vaadin Community Survey

notifications.body:
Want to have a Vaadin presentation at your local event? We've received really good feedback and are happy to join you and your group as well – let's schedule it together!

Contact Vaadin Advocate Ville Ingman at ville@vaadin.com for more info.
notifications.title: Speech at your meetup or company?
